entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers and flurries beginning near noon then changing to snow this afternoon and ending later this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
